product_name: Ultimate Survival Technologies Pico Glo Lantern
long_description: When the power goes out or you're stumbling back to your camp in the dark of night, the Ultimate Survival Technologies Pico(TM) Glo lantern is simple to find thanks to its glow-in-the-dark housing. To activate the glow-in-the-dark feature, place the lantern in a well-lit area for 5 - 20 min.; the white, rubberized area will glow for 2 hrs. with a full 20 min. "charge". Compact, lightweight lantern is ideal for backcountry and emergency use when space is limited and bright white light is essential. LED outputs 120 lumens on high and 15 lumens on low; use the SOS strobe to signal for help. Powered by 4 AA batteries (sold separately), the Pico Lantern runs for up to 91 hrs. straight on low. Remove the globe for a brighter light output. Built-in recessed hook in the base of the lantern lets you hang the lantern upside down to cast light down on a work area. Ultimate Survival Technologies Pico Glo lantern has rubberized housing that stands up to impacts; IPX4 water-resistance rating.
short_description: When the power goes out or you're stumbling back to your camp in the dark of night, the Ultimate Survival Technologies Pico(TM) Glo lantern is simple to find thanks to its glow-in-the-dark housing.
